00049  *
00050  *  File:  global_cfg.h
00051  *
00052  *  Description:
00053  *    Global program control flow graph data structure definitions
00054  *
00055  *  Creation Date :  June, 1994.
00056  *
00057  *  Author:  Richard E. Hank, Wen-mei Hwu

00063 /* 10/29/02 REK Adding config.h */
00064 #include <config.h>
00065 #include <Lcode/l_main.h>
00066 #include <Lcode/l_interproc.h>
00067 
00068 #ifndef GLOBAL_CFG_H
00069 #define GLOBAL_CFG_H
00070 
00071 typedef struct _Func
00072 {
00073   int id;
00074   char *funcName;
00075   char *fileName;
00076   unsigned short numNodes;
00077   unsigned short maxNodeId;
00078   short maxLoopId;
00079   L_Loop *loops;
00080   Set loopHeaders;
00081   Set loopBackEdges;
00082   HashTable nodeHashTbl;
00083   double weight;
00084   struct _Node *cfg;
00085   struct _Func *nextFunction;
00086 }
00087 Func;
00088 
00089 /*
00090  * Graph Function Access Macros
00091  */
00092 #define _FuncId(x)              (x)->id
00093 #define _FuncName(x)            (x)->funcName
00094 #define _FuncFileName(x)        (x)->fileName
00095 #define _FuncWeight(x)          (x)->weight
00096 #define _FuncCFG(x)             (x)->cfg
00097 #define _FuncNext(x)            (x)->nextFunction
00098 #define _FuncLoops(x)           (x)->loops
00099 #define _FuncMaxLoopId(x)       (x)->maxLoopId
00100 #define _FuncNodeHashTbl(x)     (x)->nodeHashTbl
00101 #define _FuncNumNodes(x)        (x)->numNodes
00102 #define _FuncMaxNodeId(x)       (x)->maxNodeId
00103 #define _FuncLoopHeaders(x)     (x)->loopHeaders
00104 #define _FuncLoopBackEdges(x)   (x)->loopBackEdges
00105 
00106 typedef struct _Node
00107 {
00108   union
00109   {
00110     struct
00111     {
00112       unsigned short fnId;
00113       unsigned short cbId;
00114     }
00115     id;
00116     int nodeId;
00117   }
00118   id;
00119   unsigned short flags;
00120   unsigned short operCount;
00121   int srcFnId;
00122   int region;
00123   Set dominators;
00124   struct _Arc *incomingList;
00125   struct _Arc *targetList;
00126   struct _Node *nextNode;
00127   double weight;
00128 }
00129 Node;
00130 
00131 /*
00132  * Graph Node Flags
00133  */
00134 #define NODE_PROLOGUE           0x0001
00135 #define NODE_EPILOGUE           0x0002
00136 
00137 #define NODE_NON_ENTRY          0x2000
00138 #define NODE_NON_EXIT           0x4000
00139 #define NODE_VISITED            0x8000
00140 
00141 /*
00142  * Graph Node Access Macros
00143  */
00144 #define _NodeFunction(x)        (x)->id.id.fnId
00145 #define _NodeCb(x)              (x)->id.id.cbId
00146 #define _NodeId(x)              (x)->id.nodeId
00147 #define _NodeSrcFnId(x)         (x)->srcFnId
00148 
00149 #define _NodeRegion(x)          (x)->region
00150 #define _NodeWeight(x)          (x)->weight
00151 #define _NodeFlags(x)           (x)->flags
00152 #define _NodeNext(x)            (x)->nextNode
00153 #define _NodeIncoming(x)        (x)->incomingList
00154 #define _NodeBranchTargets(x)   (x)->targetList
00155 #define _NodeDominators(x)      (x)->dominators
00156 #define _NodeOperCount(x)       (x)->operCount
00157 
00158 typedef struct _Arc
00159 {
00160   int flags;
00161   int oper_id;
00162   double weight;
00163   struct _Node *src;
00164   struct _Node *dst;
00165   struct _Arc *srcNext;
00166   struct _Arc *dstNext;
00167 }
00168 Arc;
00169 
00170 /*
00171  * Graph Arc Access Macros
00172  */
00173 #define _ArcFlags(y)            (y)->flags
00174 #define _ArcOperId(y)           (y)->oper_id
00175 #define _ArcWeight(y)           (y)->weight
00176 #define _ArcSrcNode(y)          (y)->src
00177 #define _ArcSrcNext(y)          (y)->srcNext
00178 #define _ArcDstNode(y)          (y)->dst
00179 #define _ArcDstNext(y)          (y)->dstNext
00180 
00181 /*
00182  * Arc Node Flags
00183  */
00184 #define ARC_BRANCH              0x0001
00185 #define ARC_FALLTHRU            0x0002
00186 #define ARC_JSR                 0x0004
00187 #define ARC_REGISTER_BRANCH     0x0008
00188

00198   extern L_Alloc_Pool *GraphFuncPool;
00199   extern L_Alloc_Pool *GraphNodePool;
00200   extern L_Alloc_Pool *GraphArcPool;
00201 
00202 #ifdef __cplusplus
00203 }
00204 #endif

00206 
00207 #define _newFunc()      ((Func *)L_alloc(GraphFuncPool))
00208 #define _newNode()      ((Node *)L_alloc(GraphNodePool))
00209 #define _newArc()       ((Arc *)L_alloc(GraphArcPool))
00210 
00211 #define _freeFunction(x)        L_free(GraphFuncPool,x)
00212 #define _freeNode(x)            L_free(GraphNodePool,x)
00213 #define _freeArc(x)             L_free(GraphArcPool,x)
